350 DIM N(27),S(27)
380 FOR J=0 TO 27:READ N(J):NEXT
390 FOR J=0 TO 27:READ S(J):NEXT
470 FOR J=0 TO 27:SOUNDN(J),1:NEXT:END
480 FOR J=0 TO 27:SOUNDS(J),1:NEXT:END
500 DATA 5,32,58,78,89,108
510 DATA 125,133,147,159,170,176
520 DATA 185,193,197,204,210,216
530 DATA 218,223,227,229,232,236
540 DATA 238,239,242,244
550 DATA 19,45,69,89,99,117
560 DATA 133,140,153,165,176,180
570 DATA 189,197,200,207,213,218
580 DATA 221,225,229,231,234,237
590 DATA 239,241,243,245
